channel.title: Portability on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Portability on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Google Launches Social Graph API
item.description: There were several speakers at WDN who spoke about open social networks, portability and consolidating friend information across applications. I found the talks interesting and then, while we were still at the conference, Google announced a Social Graph API aiming to do just what we’d been talking about.
